thread.title: BRIEF-AveXis Enters Agreement To Be Acquired By Novartis For $8.7 Bln

title: BRIEF-AveXis Enters Agreement To Be Acquired By Novartis For $8.7 Bln
text:
April 9, 2018 / 4:49 AM / Updated 16 minutes ago BRIEF-AveXis Enters Agreement To Be Acquired By Novartis For $8.7 Bln Reuters Staff 
April 9 (Reuters) - AveXis Inc: 
* AVEXIS ENTERS AGREEMENT TO BE ACQUIRED BY NOVARTIS AG FOR $8.7 BILLION 
* SAYS OFFER REPRESENTS A PREMIUM OF 88 PERCENT TO AVEXISâ€™ CLOSING PRICE ON APRIL 6, 2018 
* ENTERED AGREEMENT AND PLAN OF MERGER WITH NOVARTIS PURSUANT TO WHICH NOVARTIS WILL ACQUIRE AVEXIS FOR $218 PER SHARE 
* SAYS TRANSACTION WAS UNANIMOUSLY APPROVED BY BOARDS OF DIRECTORS OF BOTH COMPANIES. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
